title: Investors back ESG stock funds even as tech slide hurts returns - Economic Times
content: Investors back ESG stock funds even as tech slide hurts returns  Economic Times
description: Data shared with Reuters by funds network Calastone, which tracks the trading of units in UK-domiciled funds, shows globally focused ESG stock funds took in a net $622.28 million from Jan. 1 to Feb. 3, compared with $543.56 million flowing to non-ESG stock funds.
